\begin{verbatim}
function [pos, map, slam_state] = ...
    step_slam( data, slam_state, map, params )
\end{verbatim}

\textbf{(1) a priori estimate for particles using odometry}

\begin{verbatim}
a_priori_particles = a_priori( slam_state, data, params );
slam_state.particles = a_priori_particles;
\end{verbatim}    

\textbf{(2) a posteriori estimate for particles and map using scan matching}

\begin{verbatim}
[a_posteriori_weights, a_posteriori_map] = a_posteriori( slam_state, map, data, params );
\end{verbatim}
